price: 190. Mpe ntango (Allah) apeși bango (mwana) ya malamu basangisi ye (Allah) na ba nzambe na likabo na oyo apesi bango. Lokumu na Allah ya likolo koleka na maye bazali kosangisa ye na yango.
arabic: فَلَمَّآ ءَاتَىٰهُمَا صَٰلِحٗا جَعَلَا لَهُۥ شُرَكَآءَ فِيمَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمَاۚ فَتَعَٰلَى ٱللَّهُ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: falammā ātāhumā ṣāliḥan jaʿalā lahu shurakāa fīmā ātāhumā fataʿālā al-lahu ʿammā yush'rikūna
